direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding or merging results into the hResults map.
Both methods modify the state of the hResults map, one by adding results and the other by clearing them.
Both methods interact with the hResults map, one by adding results and the other by retrieving them.
Both methods add validation results but with different parameter sets.

Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
